version_description:
New:
• Introducing the brand NEW Mindvalley Connect. Connect to other Mindvalley Event attendees in a way that’s so good that we would make for a social networking App. This is so useful that some might even say dating app. Which we definitely are not.

New:
• Introducing the brand NEW Mindvalley Connect. Connect to other Mindvalley Event attendees in a way that’s so good that we would make for a social networking App. This is so useful that some might even say dating app. Which we definitely are not.

- Mindvalley Channels is now available to all our Mindvalley Tribe Membership customers. Channels is the collection of varied range of Mindvalley video contents grouped in one place.

- Mindvalley Connect feature is now available for Mindvalley Univ

- For the Italian, Russian and Yogi users: Welcome to a whole new experience. Now when you click on your subscription, It is guaranteed that you will be able to actually access your courses. No more surprises (a.k.a. known as bugs), we enter a new era whe

• Welcome to the New Mindvalley App. Now with a new Inteligent Quiz that captures your interests, selects from our library of content AND tailors a customized journey based on what you want to learn. And that's completely free. Your 1st Transformational J
- Bug fixes and improvements.

• Welcome to the New Mindvalley App. Now with a new Inteligent Quiz that captures your interests, selects from our library of content AND tailors a customized journey based on what you want to learn. And that's completely free. Your 1st Transformational J
- Bug fixes and improvements.

Welcome to the New Mindvalley App. Like our friends in Asia say: "Same same, but different". And by different we mean that our entire Mindvalley Quests platform is now migrated inside this App. You can now access all your mindvalley content under one sing

- You can now explore our upcoming quests in the discover tab.
